sections.heading: What is 〜っぽい (ppoi)?
sections.content:
〜っぽい is a casual suffix meaning "seems like," "tends to be," or "-ish" in English. It expresses that something has the characteristics or tendency of what precedes it.

子供っぽい "childish / child-like" 忘れっぽい "forgetful / tends to forget" 水っぽい "watery / water-ish"

children.heading: With Nouns
children.content:
Add っぽい directly to nouns:

子供 → 子供っぽい "childish" 男 → 男っぽい "boyish / masculine" 女 → 女っぽい "girlish / feminine" 安 → 安っぽい "cheap-looking"

children.heading: With Verb Stems
children.content:
Add っぽい to masu-stem:

忘れる → 忘れ → 忘れっぽい "forgetful / tends to forget" 怒る → 怒り → 怒りっぽい "quick-tempered / tends to get angry" 飽きる → 飽き → 飽きっぽい "gets bored easily"

children.heading: With Some Adjectives/Colors
children.content: 水 → 水っぽい "watery" 茶色 → 茶色っぽい "brownish" 青 → 青っぽい "bluish"

children.heading: 1. Has Characteristics Of (like/ish)
children.content: 子供っぽい "childish / child-like" 男っぽい "boyish / masculine" 春っぽい "spring-like / springish" 安っぽい "cheap-looking"

children.heading: 2. Tendency/Habit (tends to)
children.content: 忘れっぽい "forgetful / tends to forget" 怒りっぽい "quick-tempered" 飽きっぽい "gets bored easily" 疑いっぽい "suspicious / tends to doubt"

children.heading: 3. Color/Appearance (-ish)
children.content: 青っぽい "bluish" 黄色っぽい "yellowish" 白っぽい "whitish" 黒っぽい "blackish"

sections.heading: Conjugation
sections.content: っぽい conjugates like an i-adjective:

children.heading: Present
children.content: 子供っぽい / 子供っぽいです "is childish"

children.heading: Negative
children.content: 子供っぽくない / 子供っぽくないです "is not childish"

children.heading: Past
children.content: 子供っぽかった / 子供っぽかったです "was childish"

children.heading: Past Negative
children.content: 子供っぽくなかった / 子供っぽくなかったです "wasn't childish"

children.heading: Personality/Behavior
children.content: 子供っぽい "childish" 大人っぽい "mature / adult-like" 男っぽい "boyish / masculine" 女っぽい "girlish / feminine"

children.heading: Tendencies (Verb + っぽい)
children.content: 忘れっぽい "forgetful" 怒りっぽい "quick-tempered" 飽きっぽい "gets bored easily" 疑いっぽい "suspicious" 嘘っぽい "seems like a lie / fishy"

children.heading: Appearance/Quality
children.content: 安っぽい "cheap-looking" 油っぽい "greasy / oily" 水っぽい "watery" 粉っぽい "powdery"

children.heading: Colors
children.content: 青っぽい "bluish" 赤っぽい "reddish" 黄色っぽい "yellowish" 茶色っぽい "brownish"

children.heading: Often Negative Connotation
children.content:
Many っぽい expressions carry a slightly negative nuance:

子供っぽい "childish" (negative - immature) 安っぽい "cheap-looking" (negative quality) But not always negative: 大人っぽい "mature" (positive) 春っぽい "spring-like" (neutral/positive)

children.heading: っぽい vs らしい vs みたい
children.content: っぽい: Has characteristics/tendency (casual, often negative) 子供っぽい "childish" らしい: Typical of (can be positive) 子供らしい "child-like" (appropriately so) みたい: Looks like/similar to 子供みたい "like a child"

children.heading: Nuance Differences
children.content: 子供っぽい - childish (immature, negative) 子供らしい - child-like (appropriate for a child, positive) 子供みたい - like a child (comparison/observation)

children.heading: Example 1: Personality
children.content: A: 彼、もう30歳なのに "He's already 30" B: でも、子供っぽいよね "But he's childish, isn't he" A: そうだね "Yeah"

children.heading: Example 2: Appearance
children.content: A: この服、どう？ "How's this outfit?" B: ちょっと安っぽく見えるかも "It might look a bit cheap" A: そうか...別のにしよう "I see... I'll choose another one"

children.heading: Example 3: Weather
children.content: A: 今日は暖かいね "It's warm today" B: 春っぽい天気だね "It's spring-like weather" A: もうすぐ春だね "Spring is coming soon"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using with all words indiscriminately
children.content: Not natural: 嬉しいっぽい ❌ Better: 嬉しそう ✓ "seems happy" っぽい has limited usage with specific words

children.heading: Mistake 2: Confusing with observation そう
children.content: っぽい: Has characteristic 子供っぽい "childish" そう: Looks like (observation) 子供そう ✗ (unnatural) 子供みたい ✓ "looks like a child"

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using too formally
children.content: Too casual for formal: っぽい Better for formal: のような

children.heading: 〜っぽく (adverb form)
children.content: 大人っぽく振る舞う "behave maturely" 安っぽく見える "looks cheap"

children.heading: 〜っぽい人 (~ kind of person)
children.content: 忘れっぽい人 "a forgetful person" 怒りっぽい人 "a quick-tempered person"

children.heading: Positive/Neutral
children.content: 大人っぽい "mature" しっかりしているっぽい (less common) "seems reliable"

children.heading: Negative
children.content: 子供っぽい "childish" わがままっぽい "selfish" 嘘っぽい "seems like a lie"

children.heading: Seasons
children.content: 春っぽい "spring-like" 夏っぽい "summer-like" 秋っぽい "autumn-like" 冬っぽい "winter-like"

children.heading: Time of Day
children.content: 朝っぽい "morning-like" 夜っぽい "night-like"

children.heading: Texture
children.content: 油っぽい "greasy / oily" 水っぽい "watery" 粉っぽい "powdery" ベタベタっぽい (less common) "sticky-ish"

children.heading: Food
children.content: この料理、油っぽい "This dish is greasy" 水っぽいスープ "watery soup"

children.heading: Appearance
children.content: 安っぽい服 "cheap-looking clothes" 派手っぽい "flashy-looking" 地味っぽい "plain-looking"

children.heading: Common Behavioral っぽい
children.content: 忘れっぽい - forgetful 怒りっぽい - quick-tempered 飽きっぽい - gets bored easily 疑いっぽい - suspicious 騙されっぽい - gullible 照れっぽい - easily embarrassed 泣きっぽい - cries easily

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 子供っぽい "childish" 忘れっぽい "forgetful"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 子供っぽいです "is childish" 忘れっぽいですね "is forgetful, isn't it"

children.heading: Formal (avoid っぽい)
children.content:
Use more formal alternatives:

Instead of 子供っぽい: 未熟な / 幼稚な "immature"

children.heading: Characteristics
children.content: 彼は子供っぽい "He's childish" 彼女は大人っぽい "She's mature" この服は安っぽい "These clothes look cheap" 春っぽい天気ですね "It's spring-like weather"

children.heading: Tendencies
children.content: 私は忘れっぽい "I'm forgetful" 彼は怒りっぽい "He's quick-tempered" すぐ飽きっぽい性格 "A personality that gets bored easily"

children.heading: Colors
children.content: 青っぽい色 "A bluish color" 黄色っぽい服 "Yellowish clothes" 茶色っぽい髪 "Brownish hair"

children.heading: Food/Texture
children.content: このスープは水っぽい "This soup is watery" 油っぽい料理 "Greasy food" 粉っぽいケーキ "Powdery cake"

children.heading: Negative Observations
children.content: 嘘っぽい話 "A fishy story" 安っぽく見える "Looks cheap" 子供っぽい行動 "Childish behavior"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 〜らしい (rashii) - Typical of 〜みたい (mitai) - Looks like/seems 〜ようだ (you da) - It appears/seems 〜そう (sou) - Looks like I-adjective Conjugation - Similar pattern Casual Speech Patterns - Informal expressions
